Klant is struck on the chest twice. He aimed at Nighteyes and fired a singl=
e missile after switching the Dorsal Gun's settings.

Gigas was struck by a=
 Hell Beast shot. He frowned in annoyance. Kracken looked at the one they c=
alled Cracken.

Kracken: Hmm.

Kracken fires 2 missiles at Cracken.

Tarant=
opulous dodges a shot. He aims at Hell Beast again.

Tarantopulous: Only go=
d can save you now.

He fires 3 times...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Febru=
ary 20, 2001 4:01 PM
  Subject: Re: War and Peace


       Tarantulas gives=
 an insane chuckle. "Idiots! They'll never be able to 
  get into this base=
. There are no air vents, the blast doors have sealed the 
  ship, the shil=
eds are on, the weapons are armed, and the island is surrounded 
  by two m=
ore shields." He turned to Klash. "They have no chance. Were safe." 

     =
   Hell Beast was sent flying from the rapid fire. He rolled and took 
  co=
ver behinde some debris as he fired back. 

        Nighteyes ran as fast a=
s she could from the Black Fortress. Her skills 
  were needed else where a=
nd Craken had abandoned the Fem bots attack. He was 
  going to another loc=
ation. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
           
                   
    =
